shapecode_1_g=1.000

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=0.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=sample=instance/num_inst;
shape_1_per_frame2=b=sin(20*sample);
shape_1_per_frame3=g=b;
shape_1_per_frame4=r=b;
shape_1_per_frame5=
shape_1_per_frame6=///// Sphere
shape_1_per_frame7=r1=1;
shape_1_per_frame8=q10= -1+2*sample;
shape_1_per_frame9=q11=200*sample+10*q1;
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=my_x = sqrt(r1*r1-q10*q10)*cos(q11);
shape_1_per_frame12=my_y = sqrt(r1*r1-q10*q10)*sin(q11);
shape_1_per_frame13=my_z = q10;
shape_1_per_frame14=
shape_1_per_frame15=rad=.2*my_x;
shape_1_per_frame16=
shape_1_per_frame17=/////// rotations... by flexi
shape_1_per_frame18=
shape_1_per_frame19=d = 1; 
shape_1_per_frame20=zoom = .4;
shape_1_per_frame21=
shape_1_per_frame22=w3 = q1;
shape_1_per_frame23=w2 = q2;
shape_1_per_frame24=w1 = q3;
shape_1_per_frame25=
shape_1_per_frame26=x1 = cos(w1)*my_x + sin(w1)*my_y;
shape_1_per_frame27=y1 = -sin(w1)*my_x + cos(w1)*my_y;
shape_1_per_frame28=z1 = my_z;
shape_1_per_frame29=
shape_1_per_frame30=x2 = cos(w2)*x1 + sin(w2)*z1;
shape_1_per_frame31=z2 = -sin(w2)*x1 + cos(w2)*z1;
shape_1_per_frame32=y2 = y1;
shape_1_per_frame33=
shape_1_per_frame34=y3 = cos(w3)*y2 + sin(w3)*z2;
shape_1_per_frame35=z3 = -sin(w3)*y2 + cos(w3)*z2;
shape_1_per_frame36=x3 = x2;
shape_1_per_frame37=
shape_1_per_frame38=// perspective calculation
shape_1_per_frame39=
shape_1_per_frame40=l = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3);
shape_1_per_frame41=w = atan2(x3,y3);
shape_1_per_frame42=p = tan(asin(1) + atan2(d+z3,l));
shape_1_per_frame43=d = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3 + (z3+d)*(z3+d));
shape_1_per_frame44=
shape_1_per_frame45=my_x = zoom*sin(w)*p;
shape_1_per_frame46=my_y = zoom*cos(w)*p;
shape_1_per_frame47=
shape_1_per_frame48=x = 0.5 + my_x/q6;
shape_1_per_frame49=y = 0.5 + my_y/q5;
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=30
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=300
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=sample=instance/num_inst;
shape_2_per_frame2=b=sin(20*sample);
shape_2_per_frame3=g=b;
shape_2_per_frame4=r=b;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=///// Sphere
shape_2_per_frame7=r1=1;
shape_2_per_frame8=q10= -1+2*sample;
shape_2_per_frame9=q11=200*sample+10*q1;
shape_2_per_frame10=
shape_2_per_frame11=my_x = sqrt(r1*r1-q10*q10)*cos(q11);
shape_2_per_frame12=my_y = sqrt(r1*r1-q10*q10)*sin(q11);
shape_2_per_frame13=my_z = q10;
shape_2_per_frame14=
shape_2_per_frame15=rad=.3*(my_x-my_z);
shape_2_per_frame16=
shape_2_per_frame17=/////// rotations... by flexi
shape_2_per_frame18=
shape_2_per_frame19=d = 1; 
shape_2_per_frame20=zoom = .4;
shape_2_per_frame21=
shape_2_per_frame22=w3 = q3;
shape_2_per_frame23=w2 = q1;
shape_2_per_frame24=w1 = q2;
shape_2_per_frame25=
shape_2_per_frame26=x1 = cos(w1)*my_x + sin(w1)*my_y;
shape_2_per_frame27=y1 = -sin(w1)*my_x + cos(w1)*my_y;
shape_2_per_frame28=z1 = my_z;
shape_2_per_frame29=
shape_2_per_frame30=x2 = cos(w2)*x1 + sin(w2)*z1;
shape_2_per_frame31=z2 = -sin(w2)*x1 + cos(w2)*z1;
shape_2_per_frame32=y2 = y1;
shape_2_per_frame33=
shape_2_per_frame34=y3 = cos(w3)*y2 + sin(w3)*z2;
shape_2_per_frame35=z3 = -sin(w3)*y2 + cos(w3)*z2;
shape_2_per_frame36=x3 = x2;
shape_2_per_frame37=
shape_2_per_frame38=// perspective calculation
shape_2_per_frame39=
shape_2_per_frame40=l = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3);
shape_2_per_frame41=w = atan2(x3,y3);
shape_2_per_frame42=p = tan(asin(1) + atan2(d+z3,l));
shape_2_per_frame43=d = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3 + (z3+d)*(z3+d));
shape_2_per_frame44=
shape_2_per_frame45=my_x = zoom*sin(w)*p;
shape_2_per_frame46=my_y = zoom*cos(w)*p;
shape_2_per_frame47=
shape_2_per_frame48=x = 0.5 + my_x/q6;
shape_2_per_frame49=y = 0.5 + my_y/q5;
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp=0;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=zoom=.995;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=//// Flexi's beat counter
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=bt1 = bt1*0.95 + sqr(bass*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_8=mt1 = mt1*0.95 + sqr(mid*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_9=tt1 = tt1*0.95 + sqr(treb*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_10=bt2 = bt2 + bt1*0.003;
per_frame_11=mt2 = mt2 + mt1*0.003;
per_frame_12=tt2 = tt2 + tt1*0.003;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=q1 = bt2 *0.02;
per_frame_15=q2 = mt2 *0.02;
per_frame_16=q3 = tt2 *0.02;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=q5=aspectx;
per_frame_19=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_20=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_21=q11=-2+sin(time)*.5+vol;
per_frame_22=q12=-2+sin(time)*.5+vol;
per_frame_23=q29=(vol)*1;
per_frame_24=q30=vol*1.5;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw * 4;
warp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_6=`
warp_7=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 1.2 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`    float2 my_uv =  lerp(uv_orig,uv,1) ;
warp_10=`    float2 uv_x= my_uv + float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw  *8;
warp_11=`    float2 uv_y= my_uv + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw  *8;
warp_12=`    float2 uv_z= my_uv + float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw  *8;
warp_13=`    ret.x = GetPixel(uv_x).x - (GetPixel(uv_x) - GetBlur3(uv_x)).x  * 0.02;
warp_14=`    ret.y = GetPixel(uv_y).y - (GetPixel(uv_y) - GetBlur3(uv_y)).y  * 0.02;
warp_15=`    ret.z = GetPixel(uv_z).z - (GetPixel(uv_z) - GetBlur3(uv_z)).z  * 0.02;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`//    ret += - 0.004  +(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5) *0;
warp_18=`ret -= ret.yzx*0.2 - 0.06;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret=tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
comp_4=`//ret=lum(ret)>0+(lum(ret)<=0.75)*ret;
comp_5=`ret=pow(GetBlur1(uv).xyz/treb_att,1-lum(saturate(ret.xyz)));
comp_6=`ret=pow(GetBlur2(uv).xyz/bass_att,1-lum(saturate(ret.xyz)));
comp_7=`ret=1-ret;
comp_8=`}
